title: NIH move to ax bat coronavirus grant draws fire.
text: NIH move to ax bat coronavirus grant draws fire.

similar.title: Vetlife Financial Support grant.
text: Members of the veterinary community may be finding it tough to make ends meet as the social restrictions imposed to help combat Covid-19 affect their ability to earn a living. Vetlife Honorary Secretary Elaine Garvican explains that Vetlife Financial Support can provide assistance to veterinary surgeons experiencing financial hardship.
abstract: Members of the veterinary community may be finding it tough to make ends meet as the social restrictions imposed to help combat Covid-19 affect their ability to earn a living. Vetlife Honorary Secretary Elaine Garvican explains that Vetlife Financial Support can provide assistance to veterinary surgeons experiencing financial hardship.
